newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index closes up in lacklustre trade.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index closes up in lacklustre trade.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Monday closed up by 2.26 points in lacklustre volume after it delayed to next week the start of automated trading scheduled for the same day, bourse sources said.
The market's index closed at 598.84 from 596.58 on Friday.
Trade volume was one million dinars against 1,23 dinars. More than half of the traded volume was on the occasional market.
BIAT bank was up 2.59 dinar to 63.83 dinars. Airliner Tunis Air won 1.34 dinar to 18.99 dinars. Retail stores MONOPRIX was up 2.6 dinar to 42.48 dinars.
STB bank eased 0.64 dinar to 19.98 dinars.
